summary: Provides unit tests that generate synthetic heterogeneous graphs and compare the behavior of a GPU-accelerated relational graph convolution layer against the reference DGL implementation, covering both full-graph and message‑flow‑graph (MFG) execution modes.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and compatibility of the cuGraph‑based relational graph convolution operator for use in graph neural network pipelines, ensuring it produces results consistent with the standard DGL implementation on GPU hardware.
